Talent.name: Burst Shot
Talent.desc: Fires 3 Round Bursts of High Velocity Stingers

Talent.name: Laser Powershot
Talent.desc: High Energy Beam That Cuts Through Multiple Opponents

Talent.name: Boomer Powershot
Talent.desc: Powershot Produces a Bomb Blast on Collision

Talent.name: Scatter Powershot
Talent.desc: Shoots out mini projectiles on collision
